await DigiZone.getCredentials(owner.address);
const [owner] = await ethers.getSigners();
await DigiZone.issueCredential("bafybeigxjpy62glqbrx3rhcqnirm5rrsjtbi52jgonyuxbm2czfgf3mnim");
await DigiZone.registerDID("did:ethr:0xf39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB8827279cffFb92266");
const DigiZone = await ethers.getContractAt("DigiZone","0x5fbdb2315678afecb367f032d93f642f64180aa3");

const DigiZone = await ethers.getContractAt("DigiZone","0x5fbdb2315678afecb367f032d93f642f64180a3a");
const DigiZone = await ethers.getContractat("DigiZone","0x5fbdb2315678afecb367f032d93f642f64180a3a");
await DigiZone.getCredentials();
await DigiZone.revokeCredential(0);
await DigiZone.getCredentials();
